{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Netgear |model=NTV250 |fcc_date=09/02/2010 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Foxconn |manuf_model=U89X011 |type=media streamer |fcc_id=PY310200132 |ic_id=4054A-10200132 |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=NXP |cpu1_model=PNX8935 |fla1=64 |fla1_brand=Samsung |fla1_model=K9F1208U0C-PCB0 |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4H510838G-LCCC |ram1_num=4 |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM43231 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |flags=HDMI,composite AV |802dot11_protocols=bgn |oui=30:46:9A }} {{SupportPage|vendor=NETGEAR|model=NTV250|vs_id=16827}}
[http://support.netgear.com/app/answers/detail/a_id/2649/~/gpl-open-source-code-for-programmers On the Netgear GPL sources page], [ftp://downloads.netgear.com/files/GPL/ Netgear's GPL sources directory on their FTP server]
Manuf. by Foxconn / Hon Hai / Ambit, internal model U89X011 (U89X011T02)
This is Netgear's Roku XD player. Internals should be much the same as the Roku XD / XDS / whatever (see the [http://www.techrepublic.com/photos/roku-xds-teardown/499449 Roku XDS teardown on TechRepublic])
